response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering this, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire the product at a slightly higher value than its worth to you, ensuring both parties benefit. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 180}
